languages.text: {n}Вы вспоминаете момент гибели Руолдо. Трудно сказать наверняка, но вам кажется, что его голос и правда изменился — стал моложе, менее натужным. Словно человек сбросил маску.{/n}

{n}You think back to Ruoldo's last moments. It is hard to tell for certain, but it really did seem as though his voice had changed, that it sounded younger and less strained — as if he had cast off a mask.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы вспоминаете момент гибели Руолдо. Трудно сказать наверняка, но вам кажется, что его голос и правда изменился — стал моложе, менее натужным. Словно человек сбросил маску.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You think back to Ruoldo's last moments. It is hard to tell for certain, but it really did seem his voice had changed, becoming younger and less strained. As if he had cast off a mask.{/n}

{n}You think back to Ruoldo's last moments. It is hard to tell for certain, but it really did seem as though his voice had changed, that it sounded younger and less strained — as if he had cast off a mask.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ルオルドの最期の瞬間を思い返した。確かなことは言えないが、たしかに彼の声は変わったように思えた。もっと若く、そして苦しげではなくなっていた。まるで仮面を脱ぎ捨てたかのように。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You think back to Ruoldo's last moments. It is hard to tell for certain, but it really did seem as though his voice had changed, that it sounded younger and less strained — as if he had cast off a mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ルオルドの最期の瞬間を思い返した。確かなことは言えないが、たしかに彼の声は変わったように思えた。もっと若く、そして苦しげではなくなっていた。まるで仮面を脱ぎ捨てたかのように。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo'nun son anlarını hatırlıyorsun. Kesin konuşmak zor olsa da sesi gerçekten değişmiş gibiydi, nispeten genç ve tasasız çıkıyordu. Âdeta maskesini çıkarmıştı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You think back to Ruoldo's last moments. It is hard to tell for certain, but it really did seem as though his voice had changed, that it sounded younger and less strained — as if he had cast off a mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo'nun son anlarını hatırlıyorsun. Kesin konuşmak zor olsa da sesi gerçekten değişmiş gibiydi, nispeten genç ve tasasız. Âdeta maskesini çıkarmıştı.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Recuerdas los últimos momentos de Ruoldo. Es difícil de determinar con certeza, pero sí pareció que su voz había cambiado, que sonaba más joven y menos forzada, como si se hubiera quitado una máscara.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You think back to Ruoldo's last moments. It is hard to tell for certain, but it really did seem as though his voice had changed, that it sounded younger and less strained — as if he had cast off a mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Recuerdas los últimos momentos de Ruoldo. Es difícil de determinar con certeza, pero sí pareció que su voz había cambiado, que sonaba más joven y menos forzada, como si se hubiera quitado una máscara.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你不禁回忆起了罗尔多临死前的一幕。虽然你不知道这种感觉从何而来，但他的声音似乎真的变了，听起来更年轻，也不再那么紧张，就仿佛摘下了某种面具一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You think back to Ruoldo's last moments. It is hard to tell for certain, but it really did seem as though his voice had changed, that it sounded younger and less strained — as if he had cast off a mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你不禁回忆起了罗尔多临死前的一幕。虽然你不知道这种感觉从何而来，但他的声音似乎真的变了，听起来更年轻，也不再那么紧张，就仿佛摘下了某种面具一般。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous passez en revue les derniers instants de Ruoldo. Difficile de parvenir à la moindre certitude, mais il vous a semblé que sa voix avait changé, qu'elle paraissait plus jeune et moins usée, comme s'il avait tombé quelque masque.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You think back to Ruoldo's last moments. It is hard to tell for certain, but it really did seem as though his voice had changed, that it sounded younger and less strained — as if he had cast off a mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous passez en revue les derniers instants de Ruoldo. Difficile de parvenir à la moindre certitude, mais il vous a semblé que sa voix avait changé, qu'elle paraissait plus jeune et moins usée, comme s'il avait tombé quelque masque.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du denkst an Ruoldos letzte Momente. Es ist schwer, es mit Sicherheit zu sagen, aber du hattest in der Tat den Eindruck, dass sich seine Stimme verändert hatte. Sie klang irgendwie jünger und weniger angespannt ... als hätte er eine Maske abgelegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You think back to Ruoldo's last moments. It is hard to tell for certain, but it really did seem as though his voice had changed, that it sounded younger and less strained — as if he had cast off a mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du denkst an Ruoldos letzte Momente. Es ist schwer, es mit Sicherheit zu sagen, aber du hattest in der Tat den Eindruck, dass sich seine Stimme verändert hatte. Sie klang irgendwie jünger und weniger angespannt ... als hätte er eine Maske abgelegt.{/n}
